member.name: T:Sudoku.Tokenization.ITokenizable`1
member.summary: Represents an object that can create a token of type to describe the encrpyted representation.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Tokenization.ITokenizable`1.Token
member.summary: Indicates the token of the object.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Tokenization.ITokenizable`1.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance of type that is used a token.
member.exception: Throws when the token is invalid.
